algorithm_entity.name: Algebra Word Problem Solver
algorithm_entity.title: Learning to Automatically Solve Algebra Word Problems

dataset_entity.name: Algebra.com
dataset_entity.description: A crowdsourced tutoring website dataset of algebra word problems

metric_entity.name: Equation Accuracy
metric_entity.description: Measures how often the system generates the correct equation system
metric_entity.formula: Number of correct equation systems / Total number of equation systems

metric_entity.name: Answer Accuracy
metric_entity.description: Evaluates how often the generated numerical answer is correct
metric_entity.formula: Number of correct answers / Total number of answers
